```{r, warning=FALSE, error=FALSE, message=FALSE}
#correlating r0 by temperature with aggregated data and temp data 

library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(lubridate)
library(chron)
library(correlation)


```

```{r}
multreg <- read.csv("r0_county_temperature_google_mobility.csv")

#take mean of social distancing data
multreg$mean <- rowMeans(multreg[,c(12,13,14,15,16,17)], na.rm=T)

head(multreg)

lm(multreg$R0~multreg$temp_in_K+multreg$mean)
summary(lm(multreg$R0~multreg$temp_in_K))
plot(lm(multreg$R0~multreg$temp_in_K+multreg$mean))
```
